title: 237A-Odyssey Finale: The Shape of Things to Come
itunes:title: 237A-Odyssey Finale: The Shape of Things to Come
description:
Odysseus finally landed on Ithaca, but, with 120 angry, armed men in his house who want his wife and life, can he survive his homecoming?

The creatures are Black Annis and Gentle Annis. Black Annis is a pale blue and Gentle Annis wrecks boats.

--
